movies.title: The Shadow Walkers
movies.plot: Shadow Walkers is a highly suspenseful story of a group of lab technicians and military personnel who awaken in a subterranean laboratory with no memory of who they are. They quickly discover that they are sealed in, with only one way to get out alive. They must travel deeper into the underground facility to an escape tunnel that leads to the surface. Hindered by the fact there is only limited electrical power, they struggle through the darkness where they uncover a hive of genetically mutated creatures that stalk them from the shadows. Bred for combat, these monsters are endowed with razor sharp talons and rows of jagged teeth capable of ripping a man apart. While avoiding danger at every turn, they begin to regain their memories, discovering the origin of the deadly creatures and the part they played in their creation.
movies.simplePlot: Shadow Walkers is a highly suspenseful story of a group of lab technicians and military personnel who awaken in a subterranean laboratory with no memory of who they are. They quickly ...

biography.bio: Born and raised in Putnam Lake New York, Jason Coviello got hooked on acting in the summer of 1995 while dancing beneath the Brooklyn Bridge, on MTV'S "The Grind." This was his first exposure and experience into the wonderful world of acting. Soon after, Jason was propelled by the death of a friend, across the country and back again on a Soul Searching journey. This quest forever changed his life and awakened the inner artist. In 1997 Jason secured his first agent and spent a year in The Big Apple with Gold Stat Talent, auditioning, training, and learning the basics of film acting. In September of 1998 he moved to Denver Colorado to be close to his father and the awe-inspiring Rockies. Here he studied with various acting coaches and booked his first lead role in an independent feature in September of 2000. This was the 2nd of over 200 (as of 9/1/15) features, shorts, pilots, television shows, & commercials that he's had the privilege of acting in. Today Jason is represented in 4 different states and continues to look for exciting new project that help him raise the bar in his acting career. Recent Television projects include: The Red Road, Manhattan, and the New Amazon Pilot "EDGE."
biography.name: Jason Coviello

biography.bio: Jennifer Summers is an actress and writer, known for Somewhere West (2011), Hidden Lives (2009) and The Shadow Walkers (2006).
biography.name: Jennifer Summers

biography.bio: Clay Adams is an actor and director, known for Yu-Gi-Oh! GX (2004), Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (2003) and Perception (2009).
biography.name: Clay Adams

biography.bio: Cortni Mullin is an actress and producer, known for The Shadow Walkers (2006), Teresa (2008) and Busted (2001).
biography.name: Cortni Mullin

biography.bio: Rebecca Gibel is an actress, known for The Shadow Walkers (2006) and Blue Bloods (2010).
biography.name: Rebecca Gibel

biography.bio: Joe Bocian is an actor and producer, known for Longmire (2012), Bodies (2016) and Roswell FM (2014).
biography.name: Joe Bocian

biography.bio: Tierza Scaccia is an actress and producer, known for Heaven Is Hell (2014), The Shadow Walkers (2006) and Meter Maid (2011).
biography.name: Tierza Scaccia

biography.bio: Trygve Lode was born on February 3, 1963 in Mankato, Minnesota, USA. He is known for his work on Dragon and the Hawk (2001), The Highwayman (2018) and The Shadow Walkers (2006).
biography.name: Trygve Lode

biography.bio: Katie Anhalt is known for her work on The Shadow Walkers (2006) and A Modern Faerie Tale (2007).
biography.name: Katie Anhalt

biography.bio: Steven Brown is an actor, known for Ink (2009), The Shadow Walkers (2006) and Gathering of Heroes: Legend of the Seven Swords (2015).
biography.name: Steven Brown

biography.bio: Martina Brunat is known for her work on American Idol (2002), P3rsona (2008) and Top Shot (2010).
biography.name: Martina Brunat

biography.bio: Steven J. Burge is an actor, known for Residents of Gordon St (2010), 13th and Pearl (2011) and Trauma.
biography.name: Steven J. Burge

biography.bio: Brian D. Cahill is known for his work on Gathering of Heroes: Legend of the Seven Swords (2015), Bent-back (2007) and The Shadow Walkers (2006).
biography.name: Brian D. Cahill

biography.bio: Gary Carnes is an actor and assistant director, known for The One Who Loves You (2013), Rough Crossing (1997) and The Shadow Walkers (2006).
biography.name: Gary Carnes

biography.bio: Jewel Cavazos is known for her work on The Rose (2014), The Shadow Walkers (2006) and Troubled (2014). She has been married to Jeff Cavazos since April 28, 2012. They have three children.
biography.name: Jewel Cavazos
